description: Online self-paced lessons on Möbius covering Algebra, Calculus, and Maple, plus in-class tutorial activities. Includes unlimited attempts with feedback. Best 6 of 9 weeks count for marks (10% online, 5% classroom participation).

Two supervised in-person computer lab tests (40 minutes each) focusing on basic Algebra/Calculus skills and Maple usage. Lab Test 1 (10%) is hand-solved; Lab Test 2 (15%) includes Maple-based questions. Practice tests with question banks provided.

Typed mathematical solutions emphasizing written communication skills. Requires clear explanations, valid arguments, and proper typesetting. Submitted via Turnitin with feedback on clarity and correctness.

2-hour supervised exam via Möbius covering all course content. Tests deeper understanding, unexpected applications, and proof construction. May include Maple-related questions. Conducted in campus computer labs during exam period.
